conversation.message_text: The Art of Shaving: Welcome! Msg & data rates may apply. Msg frequency varies. Reply HELP for help, STOP to cancel.
The Art of Shaving: Don't forget to save our contact for exclusive deals and updates!
The Art of Shaving: Welcome to the ultimate grooming experience! Use code R8K9V2S5 for 50% off Perfect Shave Sampler. Shop Now:
The Art of Shaving: Don't forget to take 50% off Perfect Shave Sampler with code R8K9V2S5. We're here to help you look and feel your best! Shop now:

The Art of Shaving: Leave your best shave behind? Be sure to check out before your favorites sell out: https://aos.attn.tv/aHwHDoamfw9N 

Any questions we can help with before they're gone?
Can you answer a question?
The Art of Shaving: I would be more than happy to help out, ask away!
Thank you. I am looking for the aftershave balm but in the Bourbon scent.

The Art of Shaving: I'm afraid we don't have any in Bourbon at this time. We currently have it available in Sandalwood here- https://aos.attn.tv/aQNPemQZkRp5/. Do keep an eye on our website and social media for any updates regarding our after-shave balms.
Let me know if you need help with anything else!
Ok. Sad. But I already ordered the Sandalwood just yesterday. Hoping it's very similar to the bourbon.
Template used: "What is your top selling scent? / Scent recommendation."; last updated: 2022-08-02 21:40:16.522
The Art of Shaving: No worries! Sandalwood is one of our top-selling, most beloved scents. Hopefully you'll love it, too!

send_to_cs: Send to CS for legal and fraud related inquires
Send to CS for product safety inquires and threats
Send to CS for website technical issues
escalate: ESC if cx claims bodily injury as result of a product
ESC if cx highlights dangers to health/safety as a result of product
templates: For all post-purchase & warranty inquiries use "SUPPORT" temp (SPT)
For discount code issues use "SUPPORT" temp (SPT)
For product info that you can't find on the site use "SUPPORT" temp (SPT)
If cx reach out about 90 qt cooler recall, use shortcut RCC
For custom order cancellation and edit requests, don't use CED, use the designated templates instead

conversation.message_text: Igloo: Welcome to Igloo! Msg & data rates may apply. Msg frequency varies. Reply HELP for help, STOP to cancel.

In the meantime, what do you think about this instead? https://igloo.attn.tv/a_oEFLlXuBIA It features a handy cup dispenser, a pressure-fit lid that won't spill, and the kind of industry-leading cold retention you to keep your drink cold and refreshing on long, hot days.
Ok. I'll keep an eye out
I would really like the 10 gallon in blue. Is there a planned restock
Igloo: I'm afraid I don't have a specific date at this time. If it helps, we do have 5 Gallon Seat Top Water Jugs With Cup Dispenser. Take a look here: https://igloo.attn.tv/a4z1VYUFfLM5
